sanskrit_verse: ये बकव्रतिनो विप्रा ये च मार्जारलिङ्गिनः । ते पतन्त्यन्धतामिस्रे तेन पापेन कर्मणा ॥ ४.१९७॥
transliteration: ye bakavratino viprā ye ca mārgāraliṅgiṇaḥ | te patantyandhatāmisre tena pāpena karmaṇā || 4.197 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: Those Brahmins who take the vow of a crane and those who consort with felines fall into darkness profound, by that very sinful act.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority is derived from alignment with cosmic order, not ritual form alone.
Causation arises from the distortion of dharma-vṛtti (conduct pattern).
Capacity-based responsibility demands recognition of one's true nature beyond symbolic identification.
Restoration logic requires realignment with svadharma through conscious choice.
Consciousness alignment supersedes external performance in determining lawful action.
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent assumes false vocation contrary to svadharma THEN initiate consciousness-restoration protocol.
IF conduct aligns with lower-dimensional symbolism THEN assign corrective reintegration sequence.
IF individual identifies with non-human forms THEN trigger self-recognition restoration loop.
IF karmic distortion detected via behavioral inversion THEN activate prakṛti-realigning process.
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matters involving identity distortion or spiritual misrepresentation, the court must evaluate not the externals of behavior but the underlying consciousness distortion causing such acts. The threshold of responsibility lies in觉醒 recognition of svadharma, triggering automatic restoration pathways rather than punitive measures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals that association with degraded symbols leads to perceptual collapse; anupūrvaśaḥ shows how symbolic inversion causes existential blindness. Responsibility flows from awareness-capacity, not moral blame. This law restores clarity without inflicting suffering, aligning action with pure consciousness.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate Svadhyaya Reorientation Process to dissolve false identifications.
Deploy Mantra-Vidyut Correction Field to restore sensory-intellectual integration.
Engage Guru-Tattva Receptivity Module for guided self-realization.
Activate Pratyāhāra Reintegration Chamber to withdraw misplaced consciousness projections.
final_declaration: By the Supreme Source Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands executed. Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates all action.
